metadata.title: CVE-2013-2012 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
autojump before 21.5.8 allows local users to gain privileges via a Trojanhorse custom_install directory in the current working directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2012` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

autojump - 21.5.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: autojump package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '21.5.1-2').
